title: Star Wars: Tales: Vol 3
description: Collecting issues nine through twelve of the quarterly anthology smash sensation! Star Wars Tales Volume 3 features the thrilling Vader versus Maul story Resurrection, as well as comics sensation Garth Ennis' take on the life of a Stormtrooper in the riviting Trooper. Tales has explored every corner of the Star Wars galaxy and kept readers coming back for more! Collected for the first time into one prestigous volume, Star Wars Tales Volume 3 is sure to delight fans both young and old!
author: Dave Land
